ComicInfo.Title: Episode Eleven: Showdown
ComicInfo.Writer: Andrew Osborne,Viktor Kalvachev,Kosta Yanev,Viktor Kalvachev,Andrew Osborne,Kosta Yanev
ComicInfo.Summary: 'O.K. CORRAL' It's High Noon in the next to last episode of the season as Russian gangsters, Italian mobsters and not-so-innocent bystanders throw down for an all-out showdown at the blue estate. Bullets and termites fly when the critically acclaimed, 100% cool smash pulls out all the stops in the wildest blast of ultra-violence yet! (But wait! There's more...at www.BlueEstateComic.com!)
ComicInfo.Characters: Rachel Maddox,Tony Luciano,Don Luciano,Roy Devine Sr.,Sergey Ivanov,Johnny,Vlad Matrioshka,Roy Devine Jr.,Vadim Petrovich Razov
